attributes.action: WE URGE CHANNEL FOUR TO RELEASE DOG FIGHTERS NAMES TO RSPCA
attributes.additional_details:
On Thursday 12th June 2014 Channel Four aired "Gone to the Dogs", a programme showing dog fighting and interviewing those who engage in the illegal and extremely cruel act of dog fighting,

In support of the RSPCA, this petition urges Channel Four to release the names of those engaging in dog fighting to the RSPCA in order to prosecute a deadly sport that is a danger to the dogs and the public. This is not just a matter of horrible programming offending the viewer, but the chance to actually save many lives and prevent cruelty.

rejection.details: This is a matter for Channel 4.
